name: Toasty (n00begon)
description: Toasty is a game where you are a piece of jam toast collecting coins!. It is the starter game of the Phaser Jam Template. This template is created to have everything you need to get started in your game jam in Phaser. The game has an instruction screen, main gameplay loop, end screen, credits and licenses. It also shows how to use multiple input methods with keyboard, gamepad, touch and mouse all working at once.
